text: Sisca, please schedule a 20 minute meeting with John this week. Let it be "Deployment Issue"
Sisca, I want to plan a meeting on Thursday morning, at 9 AM precisely.
I would like to take this opportunity to invite you for a meeting at our office, at 9 AM on November 25, 2020, when we can discuss this further.
Are you free to meet at Bali meeting room on Tuesday morning to talk this through?
Are you free to chat at 4 PM to talk through how we could help you with product release?
Want to book in a quick meeting this week to see what we can do? Let me know when you're available.
I've got some free time next week to talk this through. Let's create an appointment.
Do you have five minutes this week to talk?
Please book a meeting room for tomorrow morning and invite Jays.
Would you be interested in hopping on a quick 15-minute call to learn more?
Sisca, do I have a schedule tomorrow?
I need to check my calendar to see if I am available.
Please check my schedule for the next week.
Sisca, am I free for the next two days?
Let me know if I have any appointment this month.
I want to make sure if I can take a day-off tomorrow.
Do I have a meeting with John today?
I need to cancel my meeting today.
Please tell Faiz that our meeting tomorrow is cancelled.
I guess we don't need the next day's meeting anymore.
Sisca, please tell all the participants of the "Project Briefing"'s meeting that the meeting is cancelled.
Sisca, cancel the appointment today.
I want to call off the next month's meeting.
I need to go tomorrow, so the meeting is cancelled.
Sisca, please reschedule today's meeting to tomorrow.
I need to move today's schedule to the next two days.
Can we meet on Friday instead of tomorrow?
I have an urgent meeting today, so, can we move the schedule to the next week?
About tomorrow's meeting, it seems like I have another plan at the same time. Should we reschedule it on Thursday?
Sisca, please tell Tina that our meeting today will be moved to the next day.
Please tell all the participants for tomorrow meeting that our appointment is moved to Saturday morning.
I need to reschedule our appointment today to this Friday, is that fine?
I need to reschedule my meeting with Faiz from tomorrow to this Sunday.
Please tell Rani that I can't join the monthly meeting today.
Sisca, please let Aliyyah know that the date of our meeting is not fit for me.
Tell Jeremy that I can join tomorrow's meeting.
I accept the Inud's invitation.
Please notify Dhiya that her meeting's invitation is match for me.
Yes, I accept the invitation and I can join the meeting.
I am sorry, I cannot join your meeting next week.
Please tell John that I can join his meeting tomorrow.
